title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Science Project-Based Online Learning for Adult Learners

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will be able to independently design projects for solving real-world problems in the field of science within six months.
Learners will be able to utilize various digital tools (e.g., virtual labs, data analysis tools) provided on online learning platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to submit and share weekly project deliverables at a rate of over 90% through collaborative activities with peer learners.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
